product_name: Cannondale Synapse Alloy 5 Compact Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: If you love long rides, the comfort-oriented Cannondale Synapse Alloy 5 Compact women's road bike is the bike for you, featuring a speedy-yet-comfortable design and trusty Shimano 105 components. Synapse frame is built to give riders enhanced handling, stability and steering precision in a more comfortable, upright position than race-oriented frames. Plus, the women-specific frame is designed to enhance the performance and comfort of women cyclists. The rear part of the frame and the carbon-bladed fork feature the Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology for damping road vibration. BB30 bottom bracket enhances stiffness for efficient power transfer. Shimano 105 shifters and rear derailleurs and a Shimano Tiagra front derailleur supply sure shifts through the 20 gears. FSA Gossamer compact crankset and a wide-ranging 12-30 tooth cassette deliver a wide range of gears for easy spinning no matter the gradient. Schwalbe Lugano tires supply low rolling-resistance and grippy handling. Specs on the Cannondale Synapse Alloy 5 Compact women's road bike are subject to change.
short_description: If you love long rides, the comfort-oriented Cannondale Synapse Alloy 5 Compact women's road bike is the bike for you, featuring a speedy-yet-comfortable design and trusty Shimano 105 components.
